ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bertoxx Shadow Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yes, one other thing...there are putrid skellies in SK that give hits against Blood Sabers...might want to avoid those. They re at a camp a few hundred feet
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yes, one other thing...there are putrid skellies in SK that give hits
against Blood Sabers...might want to avoid those. They're at a camp a few
hundred feet straight south of the zone from NK.
----- Original Message -----
From: Fire on High <scendera@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 28, 2003 11:02 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Bertoxx Shadow Knight


> Even if you do take hits against Guards/Merchants, it's possible to fix
> without having to screw up your home guild fac. Go kill gnolls in
> Blackburrow...it raises those factions without hurting your other ones.
> Also, tho I'm not sure how city guards would react to you, the Gnome
Shadow
> Knights are followers of Bertoxx as well and might welcome you as a
kindred
> soul. Watch your ankles tho.... :-)
